text: Client Server Model * It allows two applications to establish * One side starts execution and waits for communications and exchange data. the other side to contact it * This is called peer-to-peer * The other side then initiates the communications. communication * The applications can be on the same * The application which waits for an machine or different machines. incoming communication request is called a server. * The application which initiates peer-to- peer communications is called a client.
